医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
中国育龄妇女贫血患病率和危险因素的新见解贫血严重影响全球公共卫生，超过 5.71 亿女性因缺铁和其他原因面临不良健康后果的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/New-insights-into-prevalence-and-risk-factors-of-anemia-among-women-of-reproductive-age-in-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/New-insights-into-prevalence-and-risk-factors-of-anemia-among-women-of-reproductive-age-in-China.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fc63032-b445-4baa-90c6-1803ac41367d Mon, 30 Dec 2024 06:07:28 -0500 New insights into prevalence and risk factors of anemia among women of reproductive age in China
植物体形成背后的科学及其治疗潜力宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。磷脂复合体是一种新型药物递送系统，由于其具有提高植物成分的治疗功效和生物利用度的特殊能力，最近引起了广泛关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/The-science-behind-phytosome-formation-and-its-therapeutic-potial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/The-science-behind-phytosome-formation-and-its-therapeutic-pottial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=693b2ca3-2ec2-4143-8f70-1ddf9fa582a8 Mon, 30 Dec 2024 06:04:11 -0500 The science behind phytosome formation and its therapeutic potential
研究肝细胞癌患者的脂肪酸代谢宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。脂肪酸（FA）重编程在肝癌中具有重要作用。然而，FA 代谢重编程对肝细胞癌 (HCC) 异质性的影响尚未确定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Investigating-fatty-acid-metabolism-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Investigating-fatty-acid-metabolism-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14a82cc9-1a3c-45c0-8854-88e36bed9b1a Mon, 30 Dec 2024 05:37:15 -0500 Investigating fatty acid metabolism in hepatocellular carcinoma patients
Faricimab 缺乏证据表明 Faricimab 比比较疗法对黄斑水肿有更多益处自2024年7月起，faricimab也在欧洲获批用于治疗视网膜静脉阻塞继发黄斑水肿导致的视力障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Faricimab-lacks-proof-of-added-benefit-over-comparator-therapies-for-maulous-edema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Faricimab-lacks-proof-of-added-benefit-over-comparator-therapies-for-maulous-edema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e80fb76f-01ef-4482-af18-edb4d6441b6b Fri, 27 Dec 2024 21:04:23 -0500 Faricimab lacks proof of added benefit over comparator therapies for macular edema
数字咨询对于扁桃体炎评估并不可靠哥德堡大学的一项研究表明，数字医疗咨询不足以安全评估扁桃体炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Digital-consultations-not-reliable-for-tonsillitis-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Digital-consultations-not-reliable-for-tonsillitis-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=700dcb15-7bf3-4a36-98e8-1512d4f2e07a Fri, 27 Dec 2024 20:57:00 -0500 Digital consultations not reliable for tonsillitis assessment
新工具为研究线粒体钙信号传导带来巨大希望线粒体钙信号传导对于能量代谢和钙稳态至关重要，但由于 pH 值波动，对其进行准确监测具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Novel-tool-holds-great-promise-for-for-studying-mitochondrial-calcium-signaling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Novel-tool-holds-great-promise-for-for-studying-mitochondrial-calcium-signaling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6328d19-5ed5-47d2-b646-9e2b83455ffa Fri, 27 Dec 2024 20:47:00 -0500 Novel tool holds great promise for studying mitochondrial calcium signaling
绘制自闭症小鼠模型中的小脑核输出图小脑在运动和非运动功能中都起着至关重要的作用，其功能障碍与包括自闭症在内的各种精神疾病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Mapping-cerebellar-nuclei-outputs-in-an-autism-mouse-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Mapping-cerebellar-nuclei-outputs-in-an-autism-mouse-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25014a5e-4eeb-4e00-884d-170cb0699b95 Fri, 27 Dec 2024 20:42:52 -0500 Mapping cerebellar nuclei outputs in an autism mouse model
臭氧疗法在治疗脓毒症引起的肺损伤方面显示出希望脓毒症是一种严重且常常致命的感染并发症，是 ALI 和急性呼吸窘迫综合征 (ARDS) 的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Ozone-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-sepsis-induced-lung-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Ozone-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-sepsis-induced-lung-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b331861-146c-41cd-af85-e560cae93aa2 Fri, 27 Dec 2024 09:03:55 -0500 Ozone therapy shows promise in treating sepsis-induced lung injury
全球研究凸显新加坡在老龄化社会准备方面名列前茅新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 和新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 的研究人员最近进行的一项研究显示，新加坡因其应对人口老龄化挑战和利用机遇的准备程度而跻身世界前 10 名国家之列，在亚洲排名第一。哥伦比亚大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Global-study-highlights-Singapores-top-ranking-in-aging-society-preparedness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Global-study-highlights-Singapores-top-ranking-in-aging-society-preparedness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7cd2fb6-9bf3-4157-befa-765ec3a3a6af Fri, 27 Dec 2024 08:59:00 -0500 Global study highlights Singapore's top ranking in aging society preparedness
研究揭示社会不平等如何影响大脑衰老和痴呆都柏林三一学院的研究人员与国际合作伙伴合作，探索社会不平等是否会影响我们的大脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Study-reveals-how-societal-inequities-influence-brain-aging-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241227/Study-reveals-how-societal-inequities-influence-brain-aging-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b158dee3-ad7b-46fd-b948-97bc1d33e359 Fri, 27 Dec 2024 08:42:15 -0500 Study reveals how societal inequities influence brain aging and dementia
